metadata.name: New DNS ServerLevelPluginDll Installed Via Dnscmd.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the installation of a DNS plugin DLL via ServerLevelPluginDll parameter in registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DNS server (restart required)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dnscmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/config')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/serverlevelplugindll')))

output.summary: Detects the installation of a DNS plugin DLL via ServerLevelPluginDll parameter in registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DNS server (restart required)
